ref: 741 *avagarati ʻ pours out ʼ. [~avagalati: √gal1, &rcirclemacr With anal. gg: Bhoj. ogaral ʻ milk to come into the udder of a cow before giving milk ʼ; G. ogrāḷɔ m. ʻ a large brass or copper ladle for serving liquid food ʼ; M. ogarṇẽ ʻ to dish or ladle out ʼ, ogar m. ʻ a mass (esp. of boiled rice) ladled out ʼ. -- Or < *udgarati1.
